ygData.subject: RE: Gypsy Lute Fun
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Someone needs to now twink me with Dragon drums.  ;) Darkwood Piccolo should be renamed to God Flute.  Anytime anyone asks me a question about it they
ygData.messageBody:
> You twink you=) (kidding)

Someone needs to now twink me with Dragon drums. ;)

Darkwood Piccolo should be renamed to God Flute. Anytime anyone
asks me a question about it they always refer to it as my 'god flute'.

heh. Did a show&tell of a friend's fbss and my flute last night.
I need to pick up a fbss for myself soon, all the times I've gone
I've been just to damn generous, and pass it off to a guild ranger
or guild paladin even if they just got there. With the flute, the
bard with 170 some cha, was pixie stunning clerics and interrupting
about 75% of the time. 25% of the time a yk or bash interrupted.
Only twice have I seen a cleric get off a complete heal. I mean,
24 people all buffed, speeded up, etc doing god knows how much dmg
per second, and this mob's channelling lets it cast? hah.

I estimate the Clerics of Innoruuk to have around 10k hp. It takes
between 45 to 60 seconds (usually closer to 60) to drop one with 24
people (approx 12 melee). Anyway, that's over 150 dmg per second.
And a complete heal takes what? 12 seconds to cast? I'd like to
see a PC cast through 1800 points of damage, hehe. Most I've ever
heard of was someone evac'ing with 400 dmg done to them. That's
with Specialize and Channeling maxxed. So this Cleric of Innoruuk
must have like 800 channeling, and 800 specialization: alteration.

Harmonic, the god flute tooter.
